channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Side Menu Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Side Menu Lite

item.title: CVE-2024-3476|2024-05-02T06:00:03.114Z -- Unknown -- Side Menu Lite
item.description: The Side Menu Lite WordPress plugin before 4.2.1 does not have CSRF checks in some bulk actions, which could allow attackers to make logged in admins perform unwanted actions, such as deleting buttons via CSRF attacks
